p: BVDV–1 was detected in 12 of 38 BVDV–positive samples by first round RT-PCR, which produced a 305 bp product that was not detected in the other 26 BVDV–1–positive samples. The sequences detected with the first round RT-PCR in the 12 BVDV–1 positive samples were deposited in GenBank under accession numbers MG323516–MG323527 ( Table 1).
